text: If any provision of this part or the application thereof to any person or circumstance is held invalid, such invalidity shall not affect other provisions or the application of this part which can be effected without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of this part are severable.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 2-507.

1973 Ed., § 2-2307.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 19-171 enacted into law Part A of subchapter IV of Chapter 28 of Title 47.

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 47-2883.01.

DC CODE § 47-2883.07

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
